description:
Keeta – The World’s Leading Food Delivery Service
Craving pizza, fried chicken, sushi, or something new? We’ve got you covered! Whether you’re in the mood for indulgent treats or healthy choices like fresh salads and light meals, Keeta delivers your favourites straight to your door. 

Why Choose Keeta?
1.Easy to Use – Order in seconds!
2.Daily Deals – Free delivery and discounts on every order!
3.Global Cuisines – Explore various tasty options.
4.On-time Promise – Your food arrives fresh and fast. 

How It Works:
1.Download Keeta and pick a restaurant.
2.Select your dishes and checkout.
3.Sit back and enjoy!

developer: Talabat General Trading and Contracting Company
description:
Hey! Looking for the quickest food delivery? That’s easy with our new talabat app.

Whether you want a pizza, burger or groceries, choose from thousands of markets and restaurants in your city and put your hunger to an end. We’ve got it all – fast delivery, unlimited options, easy online payment and vouchers all at your fingertips.

Order your favorite food and get it delivered to wherever you are, but also get your groceries delivered to you with more cities to come. Your needs, done - simply download our app, choose your food or groceries and pay in a few taps via card or cash upon delivery. 

Browse a multitude of restaurant menus and order from countless stores. With our filters and smart search functions, you can find the exact menu or product you want in no time, available to personalize at your request.

"Pay online or in cash"
Add info to your account on our new talabat app to speed up your order process. Pay in cash or save card details to pay online, reorder your favorites anytime and save addresses so you’re ready for delivery wherever you are. Like planning ahead? Pick what time you want us to deliver to avoid hunger kicking in.

"Track your order from start to finish"
That’s right; follow your delivery from the moment it’s confirmed to the second we hand it to you. With notifications, you'll always be updated and our help center will answer any questions about your delivery – we’ve got you.

"Find exclusive deals"
Downloading the talabat app makes you a part of our fam. We’re more than food delivery; discover vouchers, promotions and deals and treat yourself to that midweek pizza or Friday night burger more often. By opting in for notifications, we'll also share new restaurants, supermarkets and stores in your area, so you’ll never miss out on the latest offers again.

Find us in Kuwait, the United Arab Emirates, Bahrain, Oman, Qatar, Jordan, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia and Egypt.

Happy ordering.

Smiles UAE is available for any mobile users in UAE. Join Smiles and start saving.


About Smiles

Smiles is e&'s full-service lifestyle SuperApp and one of the largest one-stop shops for the everyday needs of UAE residents and visitors. With 6,500 participating brands and over 15,000 partner outlets in the UAE, Smiles offers deals and rewards on food and grocery deliveries, home services booking, e& services as well as dining, shopping, entertainment, wellness and travel benefits, making it a premier lifestyle SuperApp.

Earn and redeem Smiles points on all transactions on food, grocery, home services, shopping, travel & more.

Looking for delicious food delivered to your doorstep? We've got you covered! Browse through our extensive selection of 12,000 plus restaurants to order your favorite dishes. 

Need to stock up on groceries? Smiles has got you covered there too! Order your grocery essentials on Smiles Market and 600+ more retailers.

Need help around the house? From home cleaning, handyman, salon and spa services to laundry and carwash, we have over 35 home services to help you tackle your to-do list.

Join the unlimited loop of savings with Smiles Unlimited. Get free delivery on food & grocery order, zero service fee on home services booking and unlimited Buy 1 Get 1 Free deals.

Download the Smiles app now and start savings journey. 

الإمارات متاحة لأي مستخدم للهواتف المحمولة في الإمارات العربية المتحدة. انضم إلى Smiles وابدأ في التوفير.

 
نبذة عن تطبيق Smiles


هو تطبيق e& اتصالات والمزيد المتكامل لنمط الحياة المتكامل وأحد أكبر المتاجر الشاملة لتلبية الاحتياجات اليومية لسكان دولة الإمارات وزوارها. مع مشاركة 6,500 علامة تجارية وأكثر من 15,000 منفذ شريك في دولة الإمارات، يقدم تطبيق Smiles عروض ومكافآت على توصيل الأكل والبقالة وحجز الخدمات المنزلية وخدمات إتصالات والمزيد، بالإضافة إلى مزايا إستلام الوجبات بنفسك والتسوق والترفيه والعافية والسفر، مما يجعله تطبيقًا متميزًا لنمط الحياة العصرية.
 

اكسب واستبدل نقاط Smiles على جميع المعاملات على الأكل والبقالة والخدمات المنزلية والتسوق والسفر والمزيد.
 

هل تبحث عن طعام لذيذ يتم توصيله إلى باب منزلك؟ تصفح مجموعتنا الواسعة التي تضم أكثر من 12000 مطعم لطلب وجباتك المفضلة.
 

هل تحتاج إلى تخزين البقالة؟ وفرنا لك كل ما تحتاجه! اطلب مستلزمات البقالة من ماركت Smiles  وأكثر من 600 متجر آخر.
 

هل تحتاج إلى مساعدة في أعمال المنزل؟ لدينا أكثر من 35 خدمة منزلية لمساعدتك في التعامل مع قائمة مهامك، بدءاً من خدمات التنظيف المنزلي والصيانة وخدمات الصالون وسبا إلى الغسيل وغسيل السيارات.
 

انضم إلى حلقة من التوفير بلا حدود مع Smiles Unlimited. احصل على توصيل مجاني على طلبات الأكل والبقالة، وبدون رسوم خدمة على حجز الخدمات المنزلية وعروض اشترِ 1 واحصل على 1 مجاناً بلا حدود.
 

قم بتحميل تطبيق Smiles الآن وابدأ رحلة التوفير.

The all new KFC UAE App is the fastest way to order your favorite KFC fried chicken online. Ordering food online within a few clicks has never been so easy. Pick up the food or get it delivered at your doorstep, in just a few taps from the latest KFC online food ordering app!

At KFC, we believe in real cooks, freshly-prepared good food and unrelenting quality control. Our aim is to take convenience to a whole new level and want you to have your favorite chicken available, right from the convenience of your home.

*Get started and order in minimum steps: 

1. Download the app,
2. Choose a preferred mode of language,
3. Check your favorite items categorized as part of the menu,
4. Add items to the cart,
5. Log in to use Saved Addresses or continue as Guest,
6. Choose a mode of ordering as pickup or delivery,
7. Select location and provide a delivery address/pickup address,
8. Proceed to checkout and make payment,
9. Track your order and get it delivered as lightning fast delivery,
10. Enjoy the food delivered at your doorstep. 

Why you should use KFC App:

*Pickup or Takeaway: 
When driving, pickup your delicious food from any nearest store by ordering from the application.   

*Car Hop:
100% Contactless and hassle-free experience. For our customers we bring Car Hop service for contactless delivery in your car parked in our premises.

*Late night delivery: 
Late night hunger pangs. Look no further and simply order food online from full KFC menu & we’ll rush to you with delicious chicken items even at 3 AM. This is available at select locations only.

*Social Login:
Why spend time in the login process when it can be done via social mode. Use your Google or Facebook account to login with ease.
kentucky fried chicken

*Hassle-free payments:
With multiple payment options (including Cash on Delivery, Online payments like Credit/Debit Cards etc.) at your fingertips, it’s now easier than ever to pay for your order. 

*Full KFC Menu: Order from the range of options - KFC bucket meals, Wraps, Zinger box meals, Dinner combos, Filler sandwiches, Combos for one or for sharing etc. with a variety of options from Sides & Desserts.
  
*Special Offers:
Coupons, Offers & deals customized only for you so that you can order more and get rewarded at times you order. 

*Have any feedback or queries?
KFC’s customer care is happy to help! Call Us at  – 600522252 or drop a mail to apps@americana-food.com . For more details, log into https://uae.kfc.me/

Welcome to the new official McDonald’s app.

The app is filled with great offers specially tailored to you. Deals and discounts appear regularly so check back often to see what’s new.

The news section keeps you up to date with everything that’s going on in McDonald’s near you. Look here for new games and competitions.

The nutrition section provides information on our entire menu. We provide allergy advice and nutritional information on everything from the Big Mac to a single dip!

Use our restaurant finder to find your nearest McDonald’s. Filter your search based on opening hours, facilities and get directions from wherever you are.

Hungry? Get your favourite meals, takeaways and groceries delivered to your door in minutes with Deliveroo. From local gems to big-name brands, discover thousands of restaurants and supermarkets near you.

ALL YOUR FAVOURITES, DELIVERED:

- Restaurants: Big brands and local gems
- Grocery: Always fresh with our Freshness Promise
- Convenience: Beauty essentials, flowers, gifts, DIY and more in minutes

Order from the restaurants you’re craving...

- Sushi or pizza?
- A Chinese or Indian?
- Burgers, pasta, breakfast or something sweet?

All of your favourites are just a tap away from top brands like KFC, McDonald’s, Burger King, Subway, Nando’s, Wagamama, Popeyes, Papa John’s, Wingstop, Giggling Squid, Kokoro, Pizza Express, Five Guys, Franco Manca, Dishoom, Pho, Taco Bell, Starbucks, Gail's Bakery, Joe & the Juice, GBK and more!

Or Fancy something different? Discover thousands of local gems that deliver right to your door.

£0 DELIVERY FEE WITH DELIVEROO PLUS

Become a member and you’ll also unlock:

- Exclusive offers and member-only deals
- Monthly rewards that help your money go further
- Discounted service fees*
- Earn 10% back on restaurant orders over £30*

*Plus Gold members only

It’s the simplest way to save while enjoying what you love most.

SUPERMARKETS SORTED

Get groceries delivered fast from top supermarkets, including Waitrose, ASDA, Morrisons, M&S, Sainsbury’s, Co-Op, Amazon Fresh, Whole Foods, Spar, One Stop, Iceland and Majestic Wine.

MORE THAN FOOD

We’re here for the everyday essentials and little treats too. From Boots and Healf to Not On The High Street, B&Q, Screwfix, Accessorize and The Perfume Shop, we've got you covered.

WHY CHOOSE DELIVEROO?

- Track every order live from kitchen to doorstep
- Enjoy fast, reliable delivery when it matters
- Order for right now or schedule for later
- Pick up deals you won’t find anywhere else

Download the app today and let us bring the best of your neighbourhood straight to your door.

T&Cs apply. Visit the website for full details.

Calo takes the guesswork out of healthy eating by analyzing your nutritional needs through our nutritionist-approved algorithm, then matching you with chef-crafted meals tailored to your body, fitness goals, and taste preferences. Fast & Fresh: Your meals are freshly prepared and ready within 2 hours, delivered daily for ultimate convenience. Goal-Driven Nutrition: Whether you’re looking to lose weight, maintain, or build muscle, Calo provides the perfect balance of macros and flavours to keep you on track. Total Flexibility: Pause, swap meals, or adjust your daily calories anytime—your plan, your way. Smart Integration: Sync with your health apps to track progress effortlessly. With HealthKit integration, Calo uses your fitness activity to fine-tune meal predictions, ensuring you get the most suitable, performance-driven meals every time.
Healthy eating has never been easier. Let Calo fuel your goals—deliciously and effortlessly.

BEANZ provides a personalized one-stop shop for coffee lovers to order ahead from their favorite specialty coffee stores, skip the line and enjoy unlimited rewards. 

Why BEANZ?
-  Order ahead and skip the line

Why wait? Download the app now!

The Starbucks UAE App is the easiest way for you to order ahead for pickup and earn Stars every time you purchase your Starbucks favourites - beverage, food, coffee-at-home products, and merchandise at our stores or in-app*.

With every purchase in-app or in-store of your favourite Starbucks food, beverages and Starbucks® merchandise, watch Stars add up towards Free Drinks and special benefits. Get exclusive Rewards member offers sent directly to your inbox. Conveniently find your nearest Starbucks store and view your transaction history with just a tap.

Enhance your Starbucks experience, all on your Starbucks UAE app.

Getting rewarded with Stars is super easy. Here’s how you can get started:

• Download the Starbucks UAE app and register
• When in store, Scan the QR code on your app every time you make a purchase at any participating Starbucks store in UAE to collect Stars; you get 4 Stars for every 10 AED spent!
• View your collected Stars on the home screen of your app
• Redeem Stars across 5 different tiers of Rewards, including drinks, food, and merchandise, starting from 150 Stars.
• More Stars unlock the world of Gold Membership, with free birthday drink and premium offers galore.

Skip the queues and order ahead directly from the App
• Select your store of choice
• Choose your menu items
• Customise to your liking
• Pay on the app and checkout
• Head on to your chosen store and pick up your order
• Collecting Stars? Don’t worry Rewards are built in, so you’ll earn Stars with every purchase

Don’t miss out, be a part of the Starbucks coffee club – Download the Starbucks UAE app now!
*Starbucks UAE app is available for use only at participating Starbucks Stores across UAE.

Hey there! We’re instashop, your go-to app for all things shopping, delivered fast and easy. Curious how we make life simpler for you?

With instashop, you can shop from your favourite local supermarkets, pharmacies, restaurants, bakeries, butcheries, pet shops, and more, all in one place! No more store hopping, we bring them conveniently to your fingertips.

Find the shops you love.
- UAE: From Spinneys, Carrefour, Waitrose, Choithrams & ZOOM to PAUL, Café Bateel, ALBAIK, Gazebo, Allo Beirut, The Body Shop, Toys R Us, and a LOT more! 
- Egypt: From Mahmoud ElFar, Fathallah, Circle K, Spinneys, & Lulu Hypermarket to El Ezaby, El Dahan, Ibn Al Sham, Tortina, Al Fouad, Duke’s, Dog Zone, and others.

Search for your faves or explore new gems (because there’s always room for a new discovery).

Fast and flexible delivery
Need it ASAP? Get your order delivered in as little as 20 minutes (depending on your location). Not in a rush? Schedule it for when it suits you. We’re all about convenience.

Endless variety, premium quality
With over 1,000,000 products, we have everything you need! From snacks and recipe ingredients to household essentials, pharmacy supplies, organic and fresh produce, gifts & toys, pet goodies, irresistible desserts, and more.

What can we deliver? Pretty much EVERYTHING:

- Groceries
- Pharmacy essentials
- Pet supplies
- Flowers
- Fresh produce
- Organic products
- Baby care & toys
- Bakery & cakes
- Beauty & cosmetics
- Perfumes
- Stationery & party supplies
- Home & living items
- Butchery, seafood & BBQ
- Specialty shops
- Food
- Water
- Electronics
- Fitness nutrition
- Home cleaning (operated by JustLife)
- Laundry & dry cleaning (operated by Washmen)

You can also donate to trusted charities and give back to our beloved community. 

Long story short, the rule is simple: if you need it, we’ll deliver it!

Services vary based on location. Please download the app to see what's available near you.

Fire questions: 

Where can you find us? We’re currently serving the United Arab Emirates and Egypt.
Got questions? Reach out to us at contact@instashop.ae.
Loving InstaShop? Take a moment to rate us on the App Store. Thanks for your support, we couldn’t do this without you!

Your favorite alcoholic drinks in Dubai and the UAE are now just a tap away! Discover the all-new MMI Cheers Club App – the fastest way to shop world-class wines, refreshing craft beers, iconic spirits, and so much more across the region. It’s basically your liquor store in the palm of your hand. Download the app now and browse the UAE’s widest selection of authentic drinks.
Get your alcohol delivery in Dubai straight to your door within 2 hours or in your chosen slot, chilled and ready to sip!
And that’s not all: with the MMI Cheers Club App, earn rewards every time you shop – via the app, in-store, or online. Every AED 10 spent gets you 1 Cork. Collect 25 Corks to unlock the Rewards Catalogue and trade them for the bottles you love!
Why you’ll love the MMI App:
- Exclusive Welcome Offer: Earn Double Corks with your first purchase.
- Join the MMI Cheers Club: Earn rewards every time you shop – app, in-store, or online in Dubai. Every AED 10 spent gets you 1 Cork. Collect 25 Corks to unlock the Rewards
- Catalogue and redeem your favorites!
- Chilled & Fast Delivery: Choose between a delivery slot or Express Delivery, delivered within 2 hours in Dubai; your order will always be chilled and ready to sip.
- Shop the widest range: From fine wines and craft beers to iconic spirits and customer-favorite brands, explore thousands of bottles available in the UAE market.
- Expertly curated: Discover tasting notes, cocktail recipes, food pairings, and handpicked recommendations.

The MMI Cheers Club:
Every AED 10 you spend earns you 1 Cork. Collect 25 Corks to unlock the Rewards Catalogue with bestsellers worth toasting to.
Cheers to convenience, cheers to rewards, cheers to you!
Download the MMI Cheers Club App today and raise your glass to smarter sipping in Dubai.

app_name: Pizza Hut UAE- Order Food Now
description:
Pizza Hut is one of the best fast-food restaurants in the UAE. Find amazing deals & offers on our app and get them delivered to your doorstep. Indulge yourself with veg and non-veg array of pizzas, pastas, drinks, desserts & more all from the comfort of your home!

Order pizza online from our improved Pizza Hut UAE App Store app and get a pizza that is both delicious and value for money.


We are committed to make every customer experience safe and we are ready to serve amazing pizza deals and offers, at your doorstep with our 100% contactless delivery.



*PizzaHut UAE app takes ordering to the next level, follow just a few steps:


1. Download the Pizza Hut UAE App

2. Choose a preferred mode of language

3. Check your favorite items from easy to navigate menu

4. Add your favorite food to your cart

5. Easy Login to use saved addresses or continue as Guest

6. Pick your preferred mode of ordering as takeaway or delivery

7. Select location and provide a delivery address

8. Hassle free proceed to check out and make the payment

9. Track your order and get it delivered at lightning-fast delivery

10. Time to enjoy the food delivered at your doorstep.


Why you should use the Pizza Hut UAE Apple Store App -


My Orders:

We have bookmarked all your orders, so you don’t end up spending time repeating your previous orders. Get special deals on Pizza Hut’s app with your order today.


My Favorites:

We know your love for pizza, so we have added this place to store all your favorites.


My Account:


Why spend time on multiple apps when a single app can sort you in many ways. Follow our login process which now can be done via social mode. Use your Google or Facebook or Apple account to log in with ease.


Exclusive Pizza Hut UAE Menu:

Order from a wide range of Pizza Hut’s double cheese pizza, mushroom meals, chicken pizza, vegan and veg pizza & much more. Do not forget to look for our Sides & Desserts section.

Language:

Choose your preferred language between English and Arabic and place your favorite order.

Order Status:

Check current order status - in preparation, cooking or out for delivery.

Pickup or Takeaway:

Order your favorite pizza, pasta or any other food items on our app and get easy pickup & takeaway option

Special offers:

Pizza Hut UAE provides you with various offers. Do checkout it and avail a lot of benefits.

Find Pizza Hut:

Find your nearest Pizza Hut UAE, on our food app or pickup your amazing pizza offers and deals.


Need Help?

Pizza Hut UAE's customer care is happy to help you! Call us at 600564999 For more details, please log into https://uae.pizzahut.me/en/home2

You’re One Step Closer to Free Costa

Get more of the coffee and treats you love, for free.  Collect beans with the official Costa Club UAE app, then exchange them for free barista-made coffees drinks.  It’s easy to use. Just scan the app barcode in store to earn beans on your purchases and build up your ‘bean credit’ ‘til you can redeem your beans for rewards. 

What else is new? Well, now you can order and pick up in store. No more queues. Simply click and collect. 

Ready to update? Follow the instructions below. 

Let’s get started:
      1. Download the app, register and you’ll get 2,000 beans after your first transaction (That’s a FREE barista-made  drink).
      2. Earn beans on almost everything purchased in-store by scanning the QR code at the till point.
      3. View your earned beans on the home screen - and watch them grow.
      4. Once you earn 2,000 beans, you’ll get a free barista-made  drink. 
      5. Happy birthday to you. Now you get 2,000 beans to redeem for a free drink on your big day.

The Costa Club UAE app is only available for use in Costa Coffee stores across the UAE.

Whether you’re chasing dreams, running meetings, or taking a break — Zomato is built for the ones who don’t slow down. Craving biryani between brainstorms? A cheesy burger after a long day? Or just a salad and chai to keep things steady? With lightning-fast delivery from over 3 lakh restaurants, your fuel is never far. Order in seconds, track every bite, and keep going. Hustle harder – we’ve got the food.

▪ Search and Discover Top Restaurants and Dishes
From butter chicken to sushi, dal makhani to dimsums – and legends like Domino’s, Pizza Hut, McDonald’s, Starbucks, and more – Zomato puts your cravings on speed dial. Just decisions, made easy.

▪ Access Restaurant Details
 Menus, ratings, reviews, photos – everything you need to decide fast and eat faster. Rate your meal to guide the next hungry hustler.

▪ Try Veg Mode
Veg Mode curates top vegetarian dishes, veg-only restaurants, and even veg-only delivery fleets. Clean eating with no compromise.

▪ Schedule Your Orders
 Time is currency. Lock in your lunch or dinner before the hunger hits. The scheduling feature lets you plan ahead and stay on track.

▪ Food on Train
 Even when you’re on the move, Zomato keeps up. Enter your PNR, pick your dish, and get your meal delivered to your seat at 130+ stations. No chaos, no compromises –  just food (and your schedule) right on track.

Texas Chicken™ origins are authentically Texas. We’re all about serving legendary, hand crafted meals, big bold flavor, and unique, memorable experiences for our guests. 

Place your order through Texas Chicken™ app for dine-in, takeaway, drive-thru or delivery and savor the crunch of our fresh-fried chicken wherever you are. Plus, enjoy contactless online payment and save your info for faster checkout. Awesome!

Browsing our menu has never been easier. Don’t miss out on our bold chicken meals, crispy chicken sandwiches, combos and flavor-popping sides and desserts! All you need to do is download the app and discover the chicken goodness.

Hungry for more? You will find some price crunchin’ coupons at your fingertips! They’re always there on the rewards tab where you can redeem and indulge in our hand-crafted chicken.

Prepare yourself for a flavorful meal that is both BIG and bold just like everything on our menu. Fell in love already? Add it to your Favorites list for faster ordering next time!

Register and set-up your account settings in a matter of seconds! Choose your preferred language, country and look forward to the easiest experience ever.

Managing user settings is also as simple and fast. Just enter your location and address to find Texas Chicken™ restaurants around you, add your preferred payment method and enjoy hassle-free ordering!

Dodo Pizza is perfect for a quick bite, a cozy family dinner, or a fun get-together with friends. It’s more than just fast food — we create our own recipes, work with trusted suppliers, and maintain quality at every step. So your food is always delicious, and delivery — fast.
CHOOSE AND ENJOY
– Hot pizzas on crispy crust with our signature sauce
– Tasty snacks — from light to hearty
– Delicious desserts for those with a sweet tooth
– Milkshakes and refreshing drinks
– Aromatic coffee for an energy boost
– Hearty breakfasts to start the day right
– Value combos to save


BUILD YOUR OWN PIZZA
– Try two flavors in one pizza
– Add or remove toppings
– Choose crust thickness


JOIN OUR LOYALTY PROGRAM
– Earn dodocoins — our in-app currency — and spend them on products
– Get personalized offers and discounts, including birthday deals


ORDER YOUR WAY
– Fast delivery to your door
– Takeaway when you’re nearby
– Table ordering in-store

TRACK YOUR ORDER
– Watch your pizza being prepared via live camera in the kitchen
– Track your courier on the map in real time

HAVE FUN WHILE YOU WAIT
– Stack pizza boxes in a fun mini-game
– Create your own stickerboard for in-store display


TRAVEL WITH US
Dodo has over 1300 restaurants in 20+ countries — and just one app. No need to reinstall anything when you’re abroad. Menu, delivery, offers, and service — everything works as usual.
Download the app now and order food in just a few taps. We do our best to keep it tasty, fast, and reliable. 
Got questions or suggestions? Reach out at mobile@dodopizza.com

HungerStation – The First and Biggest Delivery App in Saudi Arabia

Whatever you need, HungerStation delivers it to you before anyone else. From your favorite restaurants, groceries, and pharmacies, to gifts and flowers. Our coverage reaches over 102 cities and regions across the Kingdom, with more than 55,000 restaurants and stores ready to serve you anytime.

Why HungerStation?
Because we’re the largest in Saudi Arabia: more than 55,000 restaurants and stores at your fingertips.

Variety that matches your cravings: whether it’s Pizza, Shawarma, Sushi, Sandwiches, Fresh Salad, Fast Food, Ice Cream, Coffee, Bakery treats, Japanese dishes, or authentic Arabic meals, you’ll always find what you’re looking for. Plus, you can enjoy international cuisines, traditional favorites, healthy options, organic products, and more.

Not just restaurants!

HungerStation Market: groceries, fresh fruits and vegetables, and cleaning products.

Pharmacies: from medicine to daily personal care.

Flowers & Gifts: want to surprise someone? Order now and we’ll deliver their gift wherever they are.

Payment your way: cash, card, or Apple Pay.

Daily deals & discounts tailored for you.

HungerStation Plus: unlimited free delivery from over 35,000 restaurants, stores, and pharmacies.

How to order? Just 4 easy steps:
1- Download the HungerStation app and set your location.
2- Choose a restaurant or store you like.
3- Browse the menu and add your favorites to the cart.
4- Order and relax, your order is on the way.

What makes us stand out?
Track your order step by step until it arrives.
Smart filters and search help you find the best restaurants and deals.
Real customer reviews to guide your choice.
24/7 customer support.
Schedule your order and get it delivered at the time that suits you.

New to HungerStation?
Enjoy a full year of unlimited free delivery from over 35,000 restaurants and stores as soon as you sign up.

HungerStation is more than just an app! It’s your shortcut to saving time and effort. Order in a few taps and rest assured, everything will arrive quickly and with quality.

Download HungerStation now.


HungerStation Before Everyone.

Fast and Fresh, we know that's how you like your grocery delivered to your doorstep. Explore a wider selection of products, enjoy exclusive promotions, and get the products you love in no time when you order online at Grandiose.ae, the most exciting virtual version of your favorite neighborhood supermarket, Grandiose.

Best prices on products you love
Affordability comes first– we appreciate value for money. Enjoy discounts and promotions on your top favorites. Using the app entitles you to exclusive offers. 

A whole new level of freshness
Our product quality is our promise. Apart from our most competitive last mile team, our unique supply chain, world class warehouse, dedicated fleet and strong partnerships with brands and suppliers ensure that the products we deliver are within top standards in terms of freshness and quality.

The best of all worlds
Ever felt grocery shopping online is limiting when it comes to product selection? We make certain that we have the widest selection of products in all categories from fruits and vegetables, meat, poultry and seafood, dairy, deli, grocery staples, home and personal care, beauty and babies, pets, food from all over the world, to freshly baked products, organic and diet specific ranges. 

Delivered with care
Our packing team are experts in the art of product handling. We guarantee that the products we deliver are prepared clean, packed with care and sealed with safety.

We are wherever you are
Our dedicated fleet operates 7 days a week to reach you wherever you are.

developer: Internet Services Polen Sp. z o.o.
description:
Discover the local choice for meals, groceries, and food delivery with foodpanda!

Life can get overwhelming, but we’re here to help! Whether you need daily meals, groceries, or shopping essentials, foodpanda has got you covered with convenient food delivery.

Order Your Favourite Food with Just 3 Simple Taps!

With foodpanda, you can easily choose the food you love, and we’ll deliver it right to your door. Serving millions across over 400 cities in 11 Asian markets — Singapore, Hong Kong, Thailand, Malaysia, Pakistan, Taiwan, the Philippines, Bangladesh, Laos, Cambodia, and Myanmar — foodpanda is your go-to for everyday food delivery.

Endless Food and Grocery Delivery Choices at Your Fingertips!
Hungry for wood-fired pizza, a classic burger or fried chicken? We know the best restaurants near you – big famous brands and tiny local faves. Best part? We've got exclusive discounts and promos waiting for all new foodies. With a simple click, your food and groceries are on their way with fast delivery!

Need Groceries? We’ve Got You Covered!
Want to cook but short on time? Imagine having fresh produce, pantry staples, frozen goods, personal care items, your cute pets' needs, and much more, delivered in a flash — everything you need for a hassle-free home-cooked meal, all available through our speedy groceries delivery service from foodpanda shops and pandamarts.

Best Food and Grocery Delivery Deals Just for You!
Looking for the best savings on groceries and food? We regularly update our daily deals, personalised just for you! Here’s a tip: skip the queue and choose self pick-up for extra savings on your grocery orders, or enjoy the convenience of our food delivery options.

Save on tasty takeaways.
On the go? Try pick-up! Skip the queue and save up when you self-collect your order.

Worry-free package delivery.
Need to send or receive a parcel? Go with pandago. Our reliable fleet and on-demand delivery service will safely deliver it for you in no time.

Our tech is shaped by you.
Explore personalised offers and delicious picks just for you. Dish out what you feel about your order and let foodies know what’s yum. 

Want More? Join pandapro!
Unlock even greater savings on food delivery and grocery options with our pandapro membership today!

Live like a panda and let us take care of the rest — let’s do it the panda way with seamless food delivery!

For more info, please visit our website.

Blinkit is India’s last minute app. Trusted by millions, it is your everyday online grocery shopping app that home-delivers 10,000+ daily groceries in just a blink. Buy milk products, fresh fruits & vegetables, daily grocery, kitchen, home & office items by shopping for them online on Blinkit. Enjoy easy and smooth app experience with quick delivery.

- Best price and quality fresh fruits & vegetables
- Milk, curd, bread, butter, eggs, cheese, paneer & other daily grocery
- Snacks, biscuits, chips, ice cream, chocolates
- Cold drinks, ice, bottle opener
- Atta, rice, dal, oil, masalas, noodles
- Personal care, detergent, cleaning supplies
- Diapers & baby care
- Pet food
- Bulbs, batteries, mobile chargers
- Emergency medicines, thermometer
- Kitchen tools like chopper, blender, grinder
- Puja needs
- Stationery
- Smart watches, LED lights, Headphones



Beauty & skincare store
Makeup, luxury beauty brands & everyday skincare – now on Blinkit! Shop a huge range of authentic makeup, bath & body, hair care products, beauty accessories & much more!

Electronics store
Wireless or bluetooth earphones? Check. Smart watches? Yes. LED lights? Absolutely! Shop affordable and latest electronics online at best prices, only on Blinkit.

Safe and quick grocery delivery app
The average driving speed for Blinkit (formerly Grofers) delivery agents is 20kmph, since we have a grocery delivery store located every 2 km to instantly serve you.

Many safe payment options
Do your grocery shopping online on Blinkit & pay safely and securely for your groceries with UPI, COD or cards / wallets / netbanking / buy now pay later. We accept Sodexo meal pass and Paytm food wallet too.

Authentic phone accessories
We don’t want you to wait for the most premium and authentic phone accessories out there – which is why you can get them in minutes on Blinkit.

Printouts delivered in minutes
With Blinkit, you can get a printout of anything delivered in just minutes. With convenient options of both black & white and coloured prints, get all your documents sorted instantly!

Low prices, amazing offers
Blinkit (formerly Grofers) offers you big discounts and savings on daily grocery, bundles and bank offers. We give the best prices on online groceries with our monthly House Full Sale!

Live order tracking & helpful customer support
Track your grocery order online, right from your payment being confirmed to the delivery of your groceries. In case you need help, simply tap & chat with our customer support executives who are always ready to assist you.

Delivering groceries in 20+ cities
Instantly do your grocery shopping online! Get delivery of milk, vegetables, bread, snacks & more on the Blinkit app in Ahmedabad, Bengaluru, Chandigarh, Chennai, Delhi, Faridabad, Gurgaon, Hyderabad, Jaipur, Jalandhar, Kanpur, Kolkata, Lucknow, Ludhiana, Meerut, Mohali, Mumbai, Panchkula, Pune, Noida, Ghaziabad, Vadodara & Zirakpur.

Huge variety of local & international brands
Blinkit (formerly Grofers) grocery delivery app has a huge variety of shopping brands available online, including local specialities. In fact, Blinkit has brands you won’t find anywhere else. You can get delivery of daily grocery, festival special products, and even gourmet and international foods! Get the latest products from leading brands like boAt, The Wishing Chair, Ekam, MasterChow, The Body Shop, Farmley, Engage, The Whole Truth, The Moms Co, SuperBottoms, Tropicana, Nestle, Coca Cola, Lay’s, Harvest, Ferrero, Toblerone, Oreo, Nutella, Starbucks, Clinique, Kama Ayurveda, L'Occitane, Innisfree, Davidoff, Rage Coffee, Lindt, Starbucks, Blue Tokai, Sleepy Owl, Wingreens Farms, Bagrry's, Gunsberg, Jade Forest, Jimmy's Cocktails, Eveready, Nivea, Garnier, Lakmé, Haldiram's, Bikano, Heinz, Vahdam, Dettol, Cadbury, ITC, Colgate Palmolive, PepsiCo, Durex, Licious, Aashirvaad, Saffola, Patanjali, Fortune, 24 Mantra, TGL Co., Nestle, Amul, Dabur, & many more.

Get your favorite spirits, wines, and more delivered straight to your doorstep in record time with CityDrinks, the premier alcohol delivery service in Abu Dhabi and Al Ain Emirates, UAE. Experience our unmatched delivery speed as we bring you a wide selection of products, including bar accessories, glassware, cocktail ingredients, gourmet foods, snacks, liquors, ciders, brandy, gin, tequila & mezcal, vodka, rum, whiskey, beer, wine & champagnes, and an extensive range of other alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages from renowned brands worldwide.

Convenience is our top priority. Never worry about running dry during your special occasions, cozy evenings, or vibrant parties again. CityDrinks ensures that your favorite drinks are just a few moments away, delivered straight to your doorstep.

Key Features:

Lightning-Fast Delivery: Experience the thrill of instant gratification with our swift delivery service. We guarantee same-day delivery within a minimum timeframe of 20 minutes, depending on your location. No more waiting anxiously—your drinks are just moments away!

Live Tracking: Stay informed throughout the delivery process with our real-time tracking feature. Know exactly where your order is and when it will arrive, allowing you to plan accordingly and never miss a beat.

Schedule Your Delivery: Busy schedule? No problem. CityDrinks understands the value of time management. You can effortlessly schedule your delivery for a specific date and time that suits your convenience. We'll make sure your chosen beverages arrive precisely when you need them.

Effortless Payment Options: We believe in hassle-free transactions. Pay for your order seamlessly using the app's secure payment gateway or opt for cash on delivery—whichever method suits you best.

Favorite Brands:

Discover an extensive range of beloved brands, carefully curated to satisfy every palate. Some of our popular brands include:

Liquors: Absolut, Jack Daniel's, Hennessy, Baileys
Beers: Heineken, Corona, Guinness, Stella Artois
Wines: Moët & Chandon, Penfolds, Château Margaux, Santa Margherita
Spirits: Tanqueray, Don Julio, Glenfiddich, Johnnie Walker
And many more to explore!

Note: Age Verification

Please note that to place an order with CityDrinks, customers must be at least 21 years of age as per UAE law. We take responsible drinking seriously and strictly adhere to legal regulations.

Contact Information:

For further inquiries or assistance, please reach out to us at info@citydrinks.com. Our dedicated customer support team is here to assist you.

Download the CityDrinks app now and unlock a world of premium beverages at your fingertips. Cheers to convenience and enjoyment with CityDrinks, your trusted alcohol delivery service in Abu Dhabi and Al Ain Emirates.

Craving something delicious? Now you can enjoy your favourite Domino's Pizza in MENA Region across Kingdom of Saudi Arabia (KSA), United Arab Emirates (UAE), Qatar (QAT), Bahrain (BAH), Oman (OMN), Lebanon (LBN), Jordan (JOR), Egypt (EGY) & Morocco (MAR). 

Domino’s Pizza is here to bring the best pizza experience, be it In Store Dine In, Take Away or Delivered to your doorstep. With our easy-to-use app, you can unlock exclusive offers and deals, and have a wide range of mouth-watering pizzas, chicken delights, breads, sides, deserts and drinks. Order now through the Domino’s app and enjoy unbeatable value and deals! Whether it’s a family feast or a solo indulgence, Domino’s have you covered!

Domino’s Middle east and North Africa app makes your ordering simple and personalized, follow just a few steps:

1.	Download the Domino’s Pizza App and unlock a world of delicious possibilities!   
2.	Discover exclusive, mouth-watering offers just for you — don’t miss out!
3.	Log in for a seamless experience with your saved addresses, or order as a guest for total convenience.
4.	Decide your way — choose delivery or carryout, it is all about what you are in the mood for!
5.	Set your location and share your delivery details in a snap.
6.	Personalize your pizza and sides however you like, then fill up your cart with all your cravings!
7.	Head to checkout and enjoy a quick, secure payment process.
8.	Track your order in real-time as it speeds its way to you with our fast delivery.
9.	Savor every bite of hot, fresh, and absolutely irresistible food, delivered straight to your door!
